faq.Question: What support does the T&P Cell provide during the recruitment drive?
faq.Answer: The T&P Cell provides comprehensive support, including logistical arrangements, coordination of schedules, handling of technical setups for online tests, and ensuring smooth communication between recruiters and students.

faq.Question: Are there any accommodation facilities available for recruiters?
faq.Answer: Yes, IIT Indore can assist in arranging accommodation for recruiters on campus or nearby hotels, ensuring a comfortable stay during the recruitment process.
